title: Subscription Payment Failed
description: Fired when a subscription payment attempt fails.

planId.description: Unique identifier for the subscription plan.

amount.description: The monetary amount of the failed payment.

currency.description: ISO 4217 3-letter currency code (e.g. USD, EUR, GBP).

retryDate.description: ISO 8601 date or datetime when the next payment retry is scheduled.

attemptCount.description: The number of payment attempts made including this failure.
